title: 3 and Out - Eagles/Cowboys SNF Reaction, Allen/Mahomes, Pats QB Controversy, Giants Turnaround
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Eagles/Cowboys SNF Reaction, Allen/Mahomes, Pats QB Controversy, Giants Turnaround
description:
John reacts to the Eagles rolling to 6-0 with a SNF win over the Cowboys, and why he came away impressed with Dallas in a tough spot. He also discusses Josh Allen continuing to make an MVP case with his over becoming Patrick Mahomes equal, why there’s no guarantee Bill Belichick gives Mac Jones his starting job from rookie Bailey Zappe, why Tom Brady’s off field distractions are adding up on the field in Tampa, and why the Giants turnaround under Brian Daboll keeps looking more legit every week.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #volume #herd
